title: Bug 17289Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)
description: Try clicking on the first Combo.
OB: When clicking on the first Combo, the focus caret does not appear.
EB: The focus caret should appear in the first Combo labeled "Host:".
SR: To reproduce the issue, open the "Add a new CVS Repository" dialog and click on the first Combo. The focus caret should not appear.
